SQL_STMT_U.val: select T0.JOURNAL_DT as 'Tanggal', T0.REF_NO as 'No Referensi', C1.GTSRegNum as 'No.RM', C2.CARDNAME as 'Pembayaran', C1.CARDNAME as 'Nama Pasien', T0.JOURNAL_NO, TX.WhsName as 'Ruangan', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as'No. Perkiraan', T4.AcctName as 'Nama Perkiraan', T1.DEBIT_AMT as 'DEBET', T1.CREDIT_AMT as 'KREDIT', T1.DOC_NO, SUM(T1.DEBIT_AMT - T1.CREDIT_AMT) OVER(ORDER BY REF_NO,T0.JOURNAL_NO, T1.CREDIT_AMT,DOC_NO ) AS BALANCE, T1.KET_DT from GL_JURNALH T0 LEFT JOIN OCRD C1 ON C1.CardCode=t0.CARDCODE LEFT JOIN OCRD C2 ON C1.CardCode=t0.INSUCARD join GL_JURNALD T1 on T0.JOURNAL_NO=T1.JOURNAL_NO JOIN OACT T4 ON T4.AcctCode=t1.ACCOUNT_NO LEFT JOIN OWHS TX ON TX.WhsCode=t1.WHSCODE WHERE T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' :3 and reverse_no='' AND T0.REF_NO like '%:4%' order by REF_NO,JOURNAL_NO, KREDIT,DOC_NO

ExpSyntax.val: 'From ' & DStr({1,15},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')& ' To ' & DStr({1,16},'DD MMMMMMMMMM YYYY')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select T0.JOURNAL_DT as 'Tanggal', T0.REF_NO as 'No Referensi', C1.GTSRegNum as 'No.RM', C2.CARDNAME as 'Pembayaran', C1.CARDNAME as 'Nama Pasien', T0.JOURNAL_NO, TX.WhsName as 'Ruangan', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as'No. Perkiraan', T4.AcctName as 'Nama Perkiraan', T1.DEBIT_AMT as 'DEBET', T1.CREDIT_AMT as 'KREDIT', T1.DOC_NO, SUM(T1.DEBIT_AMT - T1.CREDIT_AMT) OVER(ORDER BY REF_NO,T0.JOURNAL_NO, T1.CREDIT_AMT,DOC_NO ) AS BALANCE, T1.KET_DT from GL_JURNALH T0 LEFT JOIN OCRD C1 ON C1.CardCode=t0.CARDCODE LEFT JOIN OCRD C2 ON C1.CardCode=t0.INSUCARD join GL_JURNALD T1 on T0.JOURNAL_NO=T1.JOURNAL_NO JOIN OACT T4 ON T4.AcctCode=t1.ACCOUNT_NO LEFT JOIN OWHS TX ON TX.WhsCode=t1.WHSCODE WHERE T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':1' and ':2' :3 and reverse_no='' AND T0.REF_NO like '%:4%' order by REF_NO,JOURNAL_NO, KREDIT,DOC_NO

select T0.JOURNAL_DT as 'Tanggal', T0.REF_NO as 'No Referensi', IIF(Tx.GTSRegNum IS NULL,C1.GTSRegNum,Tx.GTSRegNum) as 'No.RM', IIF(Tx.Penjamin IS NULL,C2.CARDNAME, Tx.Penjamin) as 'Pembayaran', IIF(TX.CardName IS NULL,C1.CARDNAME, TX.CardName) as 'Nama Pasien', T0.JOURNAL_NO, TX.WhsName as 'Ruangan', T1.ACCOUNT_NO as'No. Perkiraan', T4.AcctName as 'Nama Perkiraan', T1.DEBIT_AMT as 'DEBET', T1.CREDIT_AMT as 'KREDIT', T1.DOC_NO, SUM(T1.DEBIT_AMT - T1.CREDIT_AMT) OVER(ORDER BY T0.JOURNAL_NO, T1.CREDIT_AMT,DOC_NO ) AS BALANCE, T1.KET_DT from GL_JURNALH T0 join GL_JURNALD T1 on T0.JOURNAL_NO=T1.JOURNAL_NO left join (select TA.ObjType,TA.CardCode,TA.CardName,TA.DocDate,TA.ManualNum, TA.BPChCode,TA.TrackNo,TC.WhsName,TA.FromDate,TA.ToDate,Tb.WhsCode ,LineNum,T3.GTSRegNum,T4.CardName AS 'Penjamin' from OINV TA join INV1 Tb on TA.DocEntry=TB.DocEntry join OWHS TC on Tb.whscode=TC.WhsCode left Join OCRD T3 on TA.CardCode=T3.CardCode left Join OCRD T4 on TA.CardCode=TA.BPChCode UNION select TA.ObjType,TA.CardCode,TA.CardName,TA.DocDate,TA.ManualNum, TA.BPChCode,TA.TrackNo,TC.WhsName,TA.FromDate,TA.ToDate,Tb.WhsCode ,LineNum,T3.GTSRegNum,T4.CardName AS 'Penjamin' from ODLN TA join DLN1 Tb on TA.DocEntry=TB.DocEntry join OWHS TC on Tb.whscode=TC.WhsCode left Join OCRD T3 on TA.CardCode=T3.CardCode left Join OCRD T4 on TA.CardCode=TA.BPChCode )Tx on Tx.TrackNo=T0.JOURNAL_NO and convert(varchar,tx.LineNum) = t1.DOC_NO AND TX.ObjType = T0.JOURNAL_ID join OACT T4 on T1.ACCOUNT_NO=T4.AcctCode left join (select CardCode,BPChCode, TrackNo from OINV union select CardCode,BPChCode, TrackNo from ODLN UNION select CardCode,'', TrackNo from ORCT) TX2 ON T0.JOURNAL_NO = TX2.TrackNo LEFT JOIN OCRD C1 ON TX2.CardCode = C1.CardCode LEFT JOIN OCRD C2 ON TX2.BPChCode = C2.CardCode where t0.JOURNAL_ID in (13,24,15) AND IIF(Tx.GTSRegNum IS NULL,C1.GTSRegNum,Tx.GTSRegNum) = ':1' AND T0.JOURNAL_DT between ':2' and ':3' order by REF_NO,JOURNAL_NO, KREDIT,DOC_NO
